h1_title: How to Claim Deluxe Edition Items
h2_title: What Do You Get in the Black Myth: Wukong Deluxe Edition?
alt_text: How To Claim Deluxe Edition Items \(3\).png
img_above_text:
# How to Claim Deluxe Edition Items
If you already have or are considering upgrading to the Deluxe Edition of Black Myth: Wukong, you might be wondering how to claim the Deluxe Edition Items that come with it. Thankfully, there's an easy way in-game to claim your bonus loot and on this page, we'll talk you through how to do it.
## What Do You Get in the Black Myth: Wukong Deluxe Edition?
### Curio
* Wind Chimes

img_summary: The image depicts an in-game screenshot from the "Black Myth: Wukong" video game, specifically showing the "Equipment" section of the inventory menu. It highlights a detailed view of a Wind Chime, one of the items included in the Deluxe Edition of the game. The purpose of the image is to visually demonstrate one of the Deluxe Edition items available to players, as described in the "Curio" subsection of the "How to Claim Deluxe Edition Items" document.
